verses.verse: And Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> all Israel<WH3478>, and said<WH559> unto them<WH8085>, Hear, O Israel<WH3478>, the statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941> which I speak<WH1696> in your ears<WH241> this day<WH3117>, that you may learn<WH3925> them<WH8104>, and keep, and do them<WH6213>.
The Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with us in Horeb<WH2722>.
The Lord<WH3068> made<WH3772> not this covenant<WH1285> with our fathers<WH1>, but with us<WH587>, even us<WH428>, who are all of us here alive<WH2416> this day<WH3117>.
The Lord<WH3068> talked<WH1696> with you face<WH6440> to face<WH6440> in the mountain<WH2022> out of the middle<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>,

(I stood<WH5975> between the Lord<WH3068> and you at that time<WH6256>, to show<WH5046> you the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>: for you were afraid<WH3372> by reason<WH6440> of the fire<WH784>, and went not up<WH5927> into the mountain<WH2022><WH99999>;) saying,
I am the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which brought you out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, from the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>.
You shall have none other<WH312> gods<WH430> before me<WH6440>.

You shall not make<WH6213> you any engraved image<WH6459>, or any likeness<WH8544> of any thing that is in heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605>, or that is in the earth<WH776> beneath<WH4325>, or that is in the waters beneath the earth<WH776>:

You shall not bow down<WH7812> yourself unto them<WH5647>, nor serve them<WH3068>: for I the Lord your God<WH430> am a jealous<WH7067> God<WH410>, visiting<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> of the fathers<WH1> upon the sons<WH1121> unto the third<WH8029> and fourth<WH7256> generation of them that hate me<WH8130>,
And showing<WH6213> mercy<WH2617> unto thousands<WH505> of them that love<WH157> me and keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687>.

You shall not take<WH5375> the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> in vain<WH7723>: for the Lord<WH3068> will not hold him guiltless<WH5352> that takes<WH5375> his name<WH8034> in vain<WH7723>.
Keep<WH8104> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117> to sanctify<WH6942> it<WH3068>, as the Lord your God<WH430> has commanded you<WH6680>.
Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> you shall labor<WH5647>, and do<WH6213> all your work<WH4399>:

But the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is the sabbath<WH7676> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>: in it you shall not do<WH6213> any work<WH4399>, you<WH1121>, nor your son, nor your daughter<WH1323>, nor your manservant<WH5650>, nor your maidservant<WH519>, nor your ox<WH7794>, nor your donkey<WH2543>, nor any of your cattle<WH929>, nor your stranger<WH1616> that is inside your gates<WH8179>; that your manservant<WH5650> and your maidservant<WH519> may rest as well as you<WH5117>.

And remember<WH2142> that you were a servant<WH5650> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> brought<WH3318> you out there through a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027> and by a stretched out<WH5186> arm<WH2220>: therefore the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> you to keep<WH6213> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>.

Honor<WH3513> your father<WH1> and your mother<WH517>, as the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has commanded<WH6680> you<WH3117>; that your days may be prolonged<WH748>, and that it may go well<WH3190> with you<WH127>, in the land which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives you<WH5414>.
You shall not kill<WH7523>.
Neither shall you commit adultery<WH5003>.
Neither shall you steal<WH1589>.
Neither shall you bear<WH6030> false<WH7723> witness<WH5707> against your neighbor<WH7453>.

Neither shall you desire<WH2530> your neighbour<WH7453>'s wife<WH802>, neither shall you covet<WH183> your neighbour<WH7453>'s house<WH1004>, his field<WH7704>, or his manservant<WH5650>, or his maidservant<WH519>, his ox<WH7794>, or his donkey<WH2543>, or any thing that is your neighbour<WH7453>'s.

These words<WH1697> the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto all your assembly<WH6951> in the mountain<WH2022> out of the middle<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, of the cloud<WH6051>, and of the thick darkness<WH6205>, with a great<WH1419> voice<WH6963>: and he added no more<WH3254>. And he wrote<WH3789> them in two<WH8147> tablets<WH3871> of stone<WH68>, and delivered them unto me<WH5414>.

And it came to pass<WH8085>, when you heard the voice<WH6963> out of the middle<WH8432> of the darkness<WH2822>, (for the mountain<WH2022> did burn<WH1197> with fire<WH784>,) that you came near<WH7126> unto me<WH7218>, even all the heads of your tribes<WH7626>, and your elders<WH2205>;

And you said<WH559>, Behold<WH3068>, the Lord our God<WH430> has showed<WH7200> us his glory<WH3519> and his greatness<WH1433>, and we have heard<WH8085> his voice<WH6963> out of the middle<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>: we have seen<WH7200> this day<WH3117> that God<WH430> does talk<WH1696> with man<WH120>, and he lives<WH2425>.

Now therefore why should we die<WH4191>? for this great<WH1419> fire<WH784> will consume<WH398> us<WH8085>: if we hear the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> any more<WH3254>, then we shall die<WH4191>.

For who is there of all flesh<WH1320>, that has heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the living<WH2416> God<WH430> speaking<WH1696> out of the middle<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, as we have<WH2421>, and lived?

Go you near<WH7126>, and hear<WH8085> all that the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall say<WH559>: and speak<WH1696> you unto us all that the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall speak<WH1696> unto you<WH8085>; and we will hear it<WH6213>, and do it.

And the Lord<WH3068> heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of your words<WH1697>, when you spoke<WH1696> unto me<WH3068>; and the Lord said<WH559> unto me<WH8085>, I have heard the voice<WH6963> of the words<WH1697> of this people<WH5971>, which they have spoken<WH1696> unto you<WH3190>: they have well said all that they have spoken<WH1696>.

O that there were such<WH2088> an<WH4310> heart<WH3824> in them<WH5414>, that they would fear<WH3372> me<WH8104>, and keep all my commandments<WH4687> always<WH3117>, that it might be well<WH3190> with them<WH1121>, and with their sons for ever<WH5769>!
Go<WH3212> say<WH559> to them<WH7725>, Get you into your tents<WH168> again<WH7725>.

But as for you<WH5975>, stand you here by me<WH5978>, and I will speak<WH1696> unto you all the commandments<WH4687>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the judgments<WH4941>, which you shall teach<WH3925> them<WH6213>, that they may do them in the land<WH776> which I give<WH5414> them to possess it<WH3423>.
You shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> therefore as the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has commanded<WH6680> you<WH5493>: you shall not turn aside to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left<WH8040>.

You shall walk<WH3212> in all the ways<WH1870> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has commanded<WH6680> you<WH2421>, that you may live, and that it may be well<WH2895> with you<WH748>, and that you may prolong your days<WH3117> in the land<WH776> which you shall possess<WH3423>.
